name: Young Copper Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. climbing, 80 ft. flying
description: A large dragon with gleaming copper-colored scales, known for its love of riddles and pranks.
memorable: Combines physical attacks with unique breath weapons and clever abilities.
goals: Enjoys playing tricks on travelers and collecting treasure while avoiding violence.
relations: Often interacts with other dragons and can be encountered in mountainous regions.
environment: Typically found in hilly or mountainous areas.
strengths: Highly intelligent and versatile, capable of dealing significant damage with breath weapons and spells.
weaknesses: Reliant on breath weapon recharge and average dexterity limits agility.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite and two claw attacks; breath weapons inflict area damage and debilitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Breath, which can deal extensive damage in a line and is incredibly potent.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet and keen senses, allowing for effective detection of hidden threats.
skills: Excels in deception and perception, showcasing adeptness in stealth and cunning.
additional_information: Possesses a special ability called Corrosive Scales that damages metal weapons striking it.
Can change shape into any beast or humanoid of equal or lower challenge rating.
Has a unique ability called Flow Within the Mountain for enhanced stealth in mountainous regions.
Innate spellcasting allows casting of suggestion and hideous laughter three times per day.
Has a passive perception of 17, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting using Charisma; can cast suggestion and hideous laughter.
test_queries: playful copper dragon known for riddles
large dragon that breathes acid and gas
clever dragon with corrosive scales and tricks
dragon that can change shape and cast spells
